metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1725 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.4959.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.15').
